data.title: BEST BOLLYWOOD MOVIES OF 2024
data.text:
The misadventures of two young brides who get lost from the same train. From mistaken identities to laugh-out-aloud escapades, the ensuing chaos guarantees laughter galore and heartwarming moments.

After the events of Stree, the town of Chanderi is being haunted again. This time, women are mysteriously abducted by a terrifying headless entity. Once again, it's up to Vicky and his friends to save their town and loved ones.

During a train trip to New Delhi, a pair of commandos face an army of invading bandits.

Inspired by the Indian national football team coach and manager Syed Abdul Rahim, who is regarded as the architect of Indian football.

Two strangers meet on a fateful Christmas Eve. A night of delirious romance turns into a nightmare. Revealing anything more would be a crime.

A reckless yet brilliant squadron leader and his team of elite fighter pilots face mortal dangers and inner demons as they unite for a deadly mission.

A modern-day avatar of Vishnu, a Hindu god, who is believed to have descended to earth to protect the world from evil forces.

Blind Srikanth gets into MIT, founds Bollant Industries. Pursues goals for visually impaired while facing entrepreneurial challenges, navigating personal sacrifices. Highlights obstacles overcome by the blind in academics and business.

A young man's visit to his native village unveils a family secret and a vengeful spirit, the Munjya, who wants to get married. Now the young man must fight to protect himself and his love from Munjya's clutches.

Revolves around a group of friends who gather for a dinner and end up revealing secrets about each other.

Aryan is not able to find a perfect life partner. He meets a perfect girl, Sifra, during an official assignment in the US and falls in love with her only to discover later that it's an impossible love story.

A man who faced one adversary after another with an undying spirit. His unwavering zeal and never give up attitude led to India's first individual gold medal in any form of the Olympics.

A man fights to make his dream of creating a low cost airline a reality, facing opposition from devious competitive airline owners who threaten his business and his passengers' safety.

The journey of three childhood friends who embark on a trip to Goa that goes completely off-track

The journey of a young woman, who faces and resists a repressive system against portrayal of an antagonist.

Follows three hard-working women as their destinies lead to some unwarranted situations and they end up caught in a web of lies.

A family's getaway turns terrifying when an intruder possesses the teen daughter's body, putting her at the mercy of his increasingly sinister commands.

A crazy laugh riot which will show the outcomes of two sophisticated Punjabi men and a Punjabi girl. One of the men has a one night stand with the girl and somehow, craziness happens when she is pregnant unexpectedly.

A married couple who share a love for cricket begin training in the game due to her natural talent.

A story that travels 500 years from the 1700's to 2023 about a Hero who has to fulfil a mission left unfinished.

Police officers Jay Bakshi and Sandhya have been given task to track down notorious criminal Raj Solanki. Things take an unexpected turn when JaY finds out that Raj plays a significant role in his life.

A grieving cop who loses her child to murder and moves to another town where she's tasked with investigating the disappearance of a missing child. Exploring themes of trauma, grief, the immigrant experience, and our need for closure.
